basics.summary: A researcher specializing in AI and Geometry Processing, focused on bridging theoretical advancements to real-world applications.

work.name: University of Milano - Bicocca, Milan, Italy
work.summary: I am part of DIGAIR team led by Simone Melzi. I work on geometry processing, 3D shape analysis, and artificial intelligence, also applied to medical data

work.name: TXT E-Tech Milan, Italy
work.summary: I am a key contributor to the ARTO (Automated Robotics for Testing Optimization) project, specializing in Computer Vision and Robotics.

volunteer.summary: Volunteering as a certified first aid responder, actively participating in emergency medical services. For the past two years, also serving as an ambulance driver in urgent response situations.

education.studyType: Participation for ”Smart Cities School & Smart City Hackathon”

education.institution: Faculty of Physical and Mathematical Sciences, University of Chile

awards.title: Second Place int the FeTa Challenge MICCAI 24
awards.summary: I applied 3D deep learning techniques to fetal MRI data to extract key points and biometric measurements. These measurements are also displayed on selected 2D images from MRI slices for clinical validation, leveraging the advantages of both 2D and 3D representations.'
